# thetalake_case_record (Resource)

Theta Lake Case Record Resource. Links a record to a case.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_case_record" "example" {
  case_id   = "123"
  record_id = "rec_456"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `case_id` (String) Case ID
- `record_id` (String) Record ID
